## 209. CAMEL
### Definition
An animal of the genus <i>Camelus</i>. Is not endemic to the Caucasus, but known since ancient times; according to Nikolayaev & Starostin, the term for the camel is reconstructed for Proto-East Caucasian.

### Contexts
1. Camels live in hot places. 2. A camel can live without water for a long time.
